type: announcing the contract award of High Frequency Rail Project
short_summary: Award of high frequency rail project construction contract
description: Award of high frequency rail project construction contract to Cadence
full_summary:
# High Frequency Rail Project (HFR) Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Overview

The Government of Canada invites qualified bidders to participate in the second stage of the procurement process for the High Frequency Rail (HFR) Project. This RFP follows the release of the Request for Qualifications (RFQ) T8128-210188/C, which was closed on April 24, 2023.

## Purpose

The purpose of this RFP is to invite bidders to prepare and submit competitive proposals to carry out the Pre-Development Agreement (PDA) Activities in accordance with the Pre-Development Agreement and, subject to and in accordance with the provisions of the Pre-Development Agreement, undertake the design, construction, financing, operation, maintenance, and lifecycle rehabilitation of the Project during the Execution Phase.

## Bidders Identified for Shortlisting

Three qualified bidders have been shortlisted to participate in this RFP process:

1. **Cadence**: 
	* Equity Members: CDPQ Infra inc.; Air Canada
	* Prime Members: CDPQ Infra inc; AtkinsRéalis Canada inc.; Systra Canada inc.; Keolis Canada inc.; SNCF Voyageurs S.A.
	* Guarantors: Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec, AtkinsRéalis, Keolis SA
2. **Intercity Rail Developers**: 
	* Equity Members: Meridiam; Intercity Development Partners Inc.; DF Canada Infrastructure Group Inc.; Kilmer Transportation Inc.
	* Prime Members: Intercity Rail Developers General Partnership, Meridiam Infrastructure HDP ULC.; Jacobs Consultancy Canada Inc.; Hatch Ltd.; CIMA Canada Inc.; First Rail Holdings Limited/First Rail Canada Inc.; RATP Dev Canada Inc.
	* Guarantors: Meridiam; Kilmer Van Nostrand Co Limited; First Group PLC; RATP Développement SA
3. **QConnexiON Rail Partners**: 
	* Equity Members: HFR John Laing HoldCo Corp.; BDC HFR (Nova Scotia) Co.; Fengate HFR Limited Partnership
	* Prime Members: HFR John Laing HoldCo Corp.; BDC HFR (Nova Scotia) Co.; Bechtel Canada Co.; WSP Canada Inc.; Deutsche Bahn International Operations GmbH
	* Guarantors: Deutsche Bahn AG; Bechtel Global Infrastructure, Inc.

## Tender Requirements

The RFP and related documentation can be accessed by shortlisted bidders
